description: ED001-241156- Dredging Malpeque PEI Spring 2024 and 2025.   Public Works and Government Services Canada has the following requirement:  A requirement has been identified by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) for the need to dredge channel and point, located at Malpeque Harbour, PEI. The contract will be for a Two (2) year period for the Spring Dredge Only.  All work is to be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.127035.001.  The estimated cost for this opportunity is within the following cost category: between $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 (HST included).  Standard bid and contract security for the construction is required.
full_summary:
### ITT - ED001-241156 - Dredging Malpeque PEI Spring 2024 and 2025

**Tender Announcement Details**

* **Reference Number**: WS4300388678-Doc4300546003
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4300388678
* **Publication Date**: December 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2024, 14:00:00

**Procurement Overview**

* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Prince Edward Island
* **Regions of Delivery**: Prince Edward Island
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Supply Description**

* **UNSPSC Code**: 72141206 (Dredging services)
* **Estimate Cost Range**: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 (HST included)

**Contract Requirements**

* The contract is for a two-year period for the Spring Dredge Only.
* All work must be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.127035.001.
* Standard bid and contract security for the construction is required.

**Selection Criteria**

* Price (lowest price will be selected)

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Timothee Beausoleil2
* **Email**: timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18321432?extsite=MTgzMjE0MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
